title: Portfolio Management Risk Estimator
description: Built a full-stack application that simulates portfolio performance and assesses risk exposure. Tracks and updates market data for the top 50 companies in the S&P 500.

title: Image Recognition for Medicine Package Quality Control
description: Researched effectiveness of various image preprocessing and machine learning techniques to classify damaged medicine packaging.

title: Coefficient of Determination (R<sup>2</sup>) Visualizer
description: Helped create an educational tool that animates the calculation for R<sup>2</sup> in two variable statistics. Users are enabled to input and visualize their own data. Currently used to teach 100+ AP Statistics students per year.

title: Uno
description: Recreated Uno in Java with a graphical user interface. The application supports local multiplayer using Java sockets and has custom animations.

title: Retro Game Chrome Extension
description: Developed renditions of Breakout and Pong from scratch and moved them to a browser extension window for simple and convenient user access.
